title_en: It happens. Don't worry about it.
You're soaking wet!
Sorry to keep you waiting.
I was pleasantly surprised.
I can definitely relate to that.
title_zh: 我感同身受，我深有体会。

title_en: I hope you can join us for dinner.
title_zh: 我希望你能和我们一起吃晚饭。

title_en: He always talks big.
Time to call it a night for me.
title_zh: 今晚我就到此为为止了。

title_en: You're headed for trouble.
Don't you dear!
Who do you think you're talking to?
Dude,it's so dope!
Try to get in around nine.
Guys, help me straighten up a little please.
title_zh: 各位，来帮我打扫下房间。

title_en: He's a guy from my apartment complex.
title_zh: 他是我公寓大楼的一个人。

title_en: So Claire, what do you do ?
Actually, I'm looking to switch careers.
Let's drop the subject.
Easy,man. You will pass.
I totally slipped my mind.
Get off my case.
It's pretty catchy.
I'd better lock it up.
Give me a second, I've got something to say.
By the way,you look really young.
title_zh: 顺便一提，你看起来真年轻啊。

title_en: Don't judge a person by their apperance.
Can you refresh my memory?
How'd you manage to pull that off ?
title_zh: 你怎么弄到（这么难弄）的？

title_en: There's some kind of funky odor in here.
There's nothing good on right now.
title_zh: 现在没有什么好看的电视。

title_en: Make sure they've got everythiong.
This place is a complete rip-off.
My allergies are killing me!
title_zh: 我的过敏症要把我折磨死了！

title_en: I'm having chest pains.
It took forever to go through customs.
I ususlly ware it parted on the side.
There you go, you're all buckled in!
I got this on sale for only four bucks.
title_zh: 我买了这个只花了四块钱。

title_en: I got in an accident and messed up your car.
title_zh: 我碰上事故了，把你的车撞坏了。

title_en: I'm still on the fence.
Are you planning on asking her out?
There's a bug buzzing around my head!
title_zh: 有一只虫子一直在我耳边嗡嗡叫！

title_en: No, I couldn't possibly. I'm so stuffed.
Can you fit me in this afternoon?
Think of this as an opportunity.
title_zh: 你可以把这当做一个机会。

title_en: My old one's kind of worn-out-looking.
Do you have any formal training?
Your nose is runny. Come here and let me wipe it.
title_zh: 你流鼻涕了。过来，我给你擦擦。

title_en: What's wrong? Does your tummy hurt?
title_zh: 哪里不舒服？是不是肚子疼？

title_en: This is like a dream come true for me.
Ah,I pulled my hamstring.
It must be clogged.
Have these been run?
This was literally the best meal I've ever had.
title_zh: 这真是我吃过最好吃的。

title_en: We've actually had to turn away business.
title_zh: 我们（太忙了）得推掉一些生意。

title_en: It's never a dull moment.
Our subscription to The Times is coming up for renewal.
